member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "https://wsk.asiakastesti.op.fi/services/CorporateFileService")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". Url needs to match with this option.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.FileReference
member.summary: File reference id to be deleted (e.g. "123456")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "https://wsk.asiakastesti.op.fi/services/CorporateFileService")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". Url needs to match with this option.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.FileReference
member.summary: File reference id to be downloaded (e.g. "123456")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.FileEncoding
member.summary: Encoding of the file to be download, if empty UTF8 will be used

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "https://wsk.asiakastesti.op.fi/services/CorporateFileService")

member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". Url needs to match with this option.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileInput
member.summary: File input

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileType
member.summary: File type to upload (e.g. "pain.001.001.02")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileEncoding
member.summary: Destination file encoding, if empty UTF8 will be used

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "https://wsk.asiakastesti.op.fi/services/CorporateFileService")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". Url needs to match with this option.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890")

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.FileType
member.summary: Optional parameter FileType can be used to filter filelist. Files with specific FileType will be returned (e.g. "pain.001.001.02").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.StartDate
member.summary: Optional parameter StartDate can be used to filter filelist. Files created after this will be returned (inclusive). If this value is null, or unparseable to a DateTime object, no filter is applied.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.EndDate
member.summary: Optional parameter EndDate can be used to filter filelist. Files created before this will be returned (inclusive). If this value is null no filter is applied, or unparseable to a DateTime object, no filter is applied.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.Status
member.summary: Optional parameter Status can be used to filter filelist. Valid values for files sent to hte bank by the customer are "WFP" or "FWD" (WFP = waiting for processing. FWD = forwarded). Valid values for files sent to hte bank by the customer are "NEW" or "DLD" (NEW = files not downloaded yet. DLD = files already downloaded). If no parameter is given or if the status is "ALL", all files will be listed.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.WebServices.DownloadFileList(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.FileListInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: DownloadFileList fetches a filelist from the web service. Files can be filtered with different parameters: FileType, StartDate, EndDate or Status. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
member.returns: JToken array. Properties: FileReference, TargetId, ParentFileReference, FileType, FileTimestamp, Status

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.WebServices.UploadFile(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.UploadFileInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Uploads a file to the web service. File type needs to be specified for the file. File content is compressed by GZIP. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
member.returns: JToken. Properties: FileReference, TargetId, ParentFileReference, FileType, FileTimestamp, Status

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.WebServices.DeleteFile(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DeleteFileInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes a file from web service. In case of an error an exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.WebServices.DownloadFile(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.OP.Definitions.DownloadFileInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads a file from web service. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
